CANDIDATE  
 
Martyn Arthur John Raison  
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
 
Location: Bolton  
 
 
QUALIFICATIONS  
 
University of Bolton (Bolton, Lancashire):  
2015 -2018: BEng (First class honours) in Mechanical Engineering.  
 
 
CAREER SUMMARY  
 
November 2021 - Present . 
Vital Energi: Junior CAD technician  
My role as a CAD technician at Vital Energi involves using AutoCAD software 
to create and modify 3D models ready for use out on our many projects. The 
main focus of my work is based around pipework for the energy sector. My 
main responsibility is to produc e skids for the various projects undertaken. 
When we have no skids on, I help the team with 3D modelling on various 
projects.  
 
June 2021 – October 2021.   
Quality Assurance Engineer.  
My role as a Quality Assurance Engineer comprises of ensuring that 
every thing that is produced at the factory is to the relevant standard. It also 
includes using Fusion 360 CAD software to draw bolts, screws, nuts,  and 
anything else that needed a detailed and dimensioned drawing.  
 
October 2019 – June 2021 .  
JD Sports PLC: Tem porary financial director.  
 
March 2019 - September 2019 .  
Exchange Telecom Limited: Administrator.  
My role as an administrator here includes setting up terms, conditions,  and a 
privacy policy for the website we are designing alongside the legal team. 
    
Consul ting with other companies and negotiating licensing products as well as 
supporting the setup of the website and its services.  
 
 
COMMENT  
A qualified mechanical engineer looking to grow further within the field. As 
shown in this document , a very driven character, working well individually and 
as part of a team. Punctual and able to keep to deadlines well. Also,  an 
excellent communicator, who likes to think laterally with different perspectives 
in mind. Being able to continuously develop is important , always keen to learn 
new skills.  
 
 
For further information please contact Thomas -Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696  
or email tomj@johnston -vere.co.uk
